turret.name: Turret
turret.description:
She never hated you. 
The perfect way to protect your home... even against yourself.

weightedCube.name: Weighted Cube
weightedCube.description:
Quite useful when you need to press an enormous button at home. 
Also doubles as a surprisingly stylish coffee table.

companionCube.name: Companion Cube
companionCube.description: A loyal partner for all your adventures! Handle with care—many secrets are hidden inside...

portalGun.name: Portal Gun
portalGun.description: The ultimate tool for fast travel. The primary subject of countless experiments at Aperture Laboratories.

radio.name: Radio
radio.description: A charming little radio that plays exactly one song—forever.

boot.name: Long Fall Boot
boot.description:
A beautiful pair of boots: classy, practical, and scientifically proven! 
Guaranteed to save you from any fall, no matter the height.
